page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content:
{CUSTOMS {
The most spectacular custom in Arnside is the{Annual Gala}which is held on the last Monday in May. The proceedings begin with a procession of decorated floats and bands through the village from the Promenade to the Memorial Playing Fields. There the floats which have been decorated to a specified theme are judged. On the field there are stalls and sideshows, a gymkhana and special displays and competitions for young and old. These might include an inter-village "It's a Knockout" competition and BMX cycle riding.
